td.content: s:34 year old white M doorman presents with 17 months history of Mental Health. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking drinks daily o:Height 170 cm, Weight 53.7 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.

s:M aged 34 ys presents with Mental Health for past 7 weeks. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 53.8 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 99, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 18 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.
